mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( id, pid, NAME, url, permission, TYPE, icon, sort, hide, createTime, updateTime, delFlag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pid}, #{name}, #{url}, #{permission}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{hide}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET pid = #{pid}, name = #{name}, url = #{url}, permission = #{permission}, type = #{type}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, hide = #{hide}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, delFlag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_menu SET delFlag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, pid, name, url, permission, type, icon, sort, hide FROM sys_menu WHERE pid = #{pid} AND delFlag = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_menu WHERE pid = #{id} AND delFlag = 0
